content:
CodePackageActivationContext CodePackageActivationContext Class

Definition

Namespace:
System.Fabric
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

Represents activation context for the Service Fabric service. This is valid for fabric activated service only.

Edit

In this Article

public class CodePackageActivationContext : ICodePackageActivationContext, IDisposablePublic Class CodePackageActivationContext
    Implements ICodePackageActivationContext, IDisposable

rawMetadata.description:
Represents activation context for the Service Fabric service. 
This is valid for fabric activated service only.
